all_answers.question: Definition of variation in biology
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: Any difference between cells, individual organisms, or groups of organisms of any species caused by genetics(genotypic variation) or by the effect of the environment on the expression of the genetic potentials (phenotypic variation)

top_answer.question: Definition of variation in biology
top_answer.subject: Biology
top_answer.text: Any difference between cells, individual organisms, or groups of organisms of any species caused by genetics(genotypic variation) or by the effect of the environment on the expression of the genetic potentials (phenotypic variation)
